title: 820-00165 DISCHARGED ICON
message: Hi, I have this board and when the battery is disconnected it works fine, when you connect the battery and try to turn it on you only get the "Discharged Battery" icon on screen. It doesn´t boot or do anything further... I am thinking SMC problem there?

title: 820-00165 DISCHARGED ICON
message: That happens with battery without charger?

title: 820-00165 DISCHARGED ICON
message: On battery it doesn´t turn on.... if I disconnect the battery it boots and works fine. If its on and I connect the battery It instantly turns off...

title: 820-00165 DISCHARGED ICON
message:
Post exact PPBUS_G3H voltage on charger only.
Chec if Q7155 is not shorted D-S.
